name: Mc TileVania
description:
This game is the fourth prototype clone game of edleron. I would like to thank game dev tv for their efforts. The game has simple mechanics. 

  1.  It is played with arrow keys or (W + A + D + S). 
  2. Fire touch (Mouse click)
  3.  You can gain new features by clicking on the objects in the game.
